title: Appendix 6 - Technical Assessment
purpose: Evaluate source data quality, lawful use conditions, linkage, and readiness for synthesis.

fields.name: lawfulUse
fields.label: Describe lawful use and data-sharing constraints that apply to the source dataset.

fields.name: approvals
fields.label: List any data access or ethics approvals relevant to the data.

fields.name: linkageRequired
fields.label: Is data linkage required before synthesis?

fields.name: linkageDetails
fields.label: If yes, describe linkage datasets, purpose, and risk controls.

fields.name: piatrigger
fields.label: Does linkage or cross-organisation use trigger a PIA? Explain.

fields.name: fitForPurpose
fields.label: Describe how the source data meet the needs of the proposed use case.

fields.name: minimumNecessary
fields.label: List minimum data elements necessary for synthesis.

fields.name: directIdentifiersRemoved
fields.label: Confirm direct identifiers have been removed or irreversibly treated.

fields.name: sensitiveFields
fields.label: Identify any sensitive variables retained and rationale for inclusion.

fields.name: metadataAvailable
fields.label: Is metadata/data dictionary available for Requestor?
